2025-12-12JUSOther Than Statutory AuthorityAppointment of a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of AppealAppointment of Michelle M. Kelly of the city of Halifax, in the Province of Nova Scotia, one of His Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal
precis: Appointment of Michelle M. Kelly of the city of Halifax, in the Province of Nova Scotia, one of His Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
